short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Connect to Figma API and preview a color palette as CSS Variables or JSON Tokens

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Figma to Tokens provides either CSS Variables or JSON Tokens as HEX or RGB to quickly copy or you can preview CSS variables in the styles pane of Chrome DevTools if your website is using the same css variables pattern as your Figma file you will see the changes. Note: only local storage is used no API keys are saved
